scripts.dev: concurrently -c "green,blue" -n web,addin "npm run dev --workspace @people-picker/web" "npm run dev --workspace @people-picker/addin"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @people-picker/sdk && npm run build --workspace @people-picker/web && npm run build --workspace @people-picker/addin
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace @people-picker/web && npm run lint --workspace @people-picker/addin
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @people-picker/sdk && npm run typecheck --workspace @people-picker/web && npm run typecheck --workspace @people-picker/addin
